context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

apply for a personal loan or a medical loan to fund the medication

look for different ways to fundraise the needed money for the medication
seek assistance from different sources
seek help from charities, nonprofits, or government assistance programs that focus on helping families with medical expenses

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: contact her mother to see if there's any possibility of her bringing the assignment to school, if time allows
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the homework, promising to bring it the next day or email it as soon as she can
explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could hand in the assignment the next day or if she could email a digital copy of the assignment

quickly recreate the assignment if time permits or reach out to her teacher, explaining the situation and ask for an extension
call or text her mom to bring the homework to school
contact her mother and ask if she can bring the assignment to school, or if that's not possible, explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: build a shelter using available materials to protect them from the elements
create a signal for help
start a signal fire that would not only keep them warm, but could also potentially alert rescuers to their location
use smoke signals or build a large, visible SOS signal on an open patch of land to alert any passing aircraft
build a shelter to keep them protected from the wind and cold
start a fire to keep them warm and signal their location to potential rescuers
collect snow and melt it for drinking water
start rationing the remaining food and water to extend their supply as much as possible
use the tools he has at hand to survive
start making signals for help, such as setting up a large 'SOS' symbol on an open area using rocks or sticks
